summary: How do federal agencies protect the integrity of scientific research? There is federal guidance on scientific integrity that includes principles that: Ensure the open exchange of information Prevent the distortion of research findings for political or other reasons The 9 agencies we reviewed have policies based on those principles. Most of them have taken some action in terms of educating staff, providing oversight, and monitoring...
title: Scientific Integrity Policies: Additional Actions Could Strengthen Integrity of Federal Research
